How do you add rate chart for your selected area?
Please enter your phone number here.
Please enter the OTP has sent to your mobile number
Scan the QR code to add in reserve
Need help for Adding Rate Chart ?
Minimum Amount rider should have in wallet
Know more about ride time and hold time
Search with user name or user ID
Know more about ride time and hold time
To add a new bicycle click "Add Now" button. \n Scan the QR code and enter the Bicycle ID

To add new area, Admin can choose any area by writting the name of the place in the search bar. 
 Admin has to choose tweleve coordinates/points in the map of her/his choice. 
 A pop-up window will open to set the name of the area. 
 Hit OK button and then Proceed button to move forward. 
 Set all the timeslabs as well as price for rate chart and press Proceed.
 To create an area of his/her choice, Admin should set the Maximum ride time, Maximum cycle hold time, Minimum amount of money present in the wallet, Opening hour and Closing hour of the service and Geo-Fencing fine
 and then hit Proceed button and Area will be added to the database.

To create an area of his/her choice, Admin should set the Maximum ride time, Maximum cycle hold time, Minimum amount of money present in the wallet, Opening hour and Closing hour of the service and Geo-Fencing fine\n and then hit Proceed button and Area will be added to the database.
To set the rate of Bicycle, Admin should set the Timeslabs as well as the Price.\n Admin has to change the custom time number picker and corrosponding price.

How do you set Rate chart on basis of Time ?
Add Rate chart timeslabs and price now.
How do you Manage your area/system ?
Add all the constraints for the area.
Set your subscription for an area
Help for creating subscription for an area?
How do you set Subscription for an Area ?

To create subscription plan user has to add amount of money for subscription, time period of\n subscription and unit of time that will be added to any user s ride time after subscribing to any plan. \n User has to enter all four- Basic, Standard, Sweet, Premium subscription plan details and proceed further.
Know how to add cycle in repair pool.
How do you add cycle in repair pool ?

To add a bicycle in repair-pool, scan the QR code of the bicycle. \n Hit Yes to add cycle in the pool and No to discontinue.\n All the bicycles which are added in repair-pool will be shown in the repair list
Enter contact number for customer support
Set Ride Mintues for subscription plan
Choose rate type option for payment
Do you want to make this plan as Carry-Forward
Set Payment on Rate type basis
Do you want to roll over the sub-admin authority?
Do you want to give the sub-admin auhtority?
ⓘ All messages will send as email to the Super-Admin email id. After composing the message it will take the user to the default email app of the user phone.

We believe that a seamless transportation system is the heart of a smart city. Our research group’s expertise lies broadly in the field of non- motorised transportation (bicycle and pedestrian infrastructure, public bicycle sharing, last mile connectivity), public transportation (bus transit service design, service optimisation and software development, network optimisation, route design and rationalisation, feeder service design), land-use transportation modelling (activity-based models, behavioural models based on mode choice, transit oriented development), and intelligent transportation systems.

Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur
 Kharagpur, India - 721302

 Phone: +91-3222-255221
 FAX : +91-3222-255303
Need help to add rate chart ?

To add rate chart Sub Admin has to select the rate type from the spinner.
There are two types of rates like Time and Distance.

 Another RadioGroup is present where Sub Admin has to choose the payment type of rate.
 On choosing any one of the radiobox item if Sub Admin add time and distance basis rate chart then user will be charged money as per the chosen radiobox item.
 Sub Admin has to enter the amount of money for the choices made and hit Add Rate button to save the details.
